title: Grae Drake Movie Review- The Gray Man, NOPE
description:
The former senior editor at RottenTomatoes.com joined us to talk about the action/thriller “The Gray Man” featuring Ryan Gosling and Chris Evans that is now streaming on Netflix…

PLUS Jordan Peele’s science fiction horror film “NOPE” is in theaters today.
itunes:author: YEA Networks
